name: Super Sumo Supreme
description:
4 player local baby sumo brawler. Set in the near future, Japan has too many fat babies and holds an sumo baby hunger games tournament.

Push your enemy baby into the "Not There Zone" to damage them.

Requires a pc controller like Xbox/windows controller. left thumb stick to move, "B" to throw and "A" to Dash/dodge.

created for nordic gamejam 2017 by:
Søren Berg Pedersen
A Bit Ape
Jakob Arndal
Anders Hofsten
Henrik Mads Hansen
Jason Lissner
